name: The Forgotten (itch) (AfroCentricGirl)
description:
This adventure goes back to the past with two historical figures searching for the forgotten in the land of Egypt. As they search around the temple, they are tested with greed and selfish thoughts that might push one of them to the edge. They must escape with what they find, but if they escape, will they bring the forgotten curse with them too?

  • Choose your choice
  • Solve puzzles
  • You can always go back
